docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This is a template repository for LURAD Documentation. It covers

docs.title: LURAD Comrehensive Radiation Monitor Package
docs.text: The LURAD instrument is a low-mass, comprehensive radiation-monitoring package. It comprises three measurement subsystems, designed to identify protons, ions, neutrons, electrons/positrons, and gamma rays, measure their kinetic energy, and provide microdosimetry data. .....
